beer.name: Pete's Wanderlust Cream Ale
beer.description: Pete's winter seasonal Wanderlust Cream Ale, is a velvety smooth brew offering endless fascination. Pete's Wicked Wanderlust Cream Ale is a light amber brew with a rhapsody of Cluster hops and select Munich and wheat malts. The rich, creamy taste invites you on a journey of wonderment and intrigue. Sit back. Enjoy the ride.
